resources.string:
"Thank you for taking part in this experiment.

You need to be connected to the internet via public wifi or mobile data.
 Please use the app exactly once a day for the duration of the experiment
 The app presents to you a joke of the day.
 You can choose to like or dislike a joke, or, simply exit without choosing either.
 Remember your choice is being logged but you will remain anonymous in your analysis.

 Have a good day"
